featured.text: The hula hoop gained international popularity in the late 1950s, when a plastic version was successfully marketed by California’s Wham-O toy company.
Why did Wham-O start making hula hoops?

definition.zh_def: 猛擊，撞擊或突然的聲音
definition.en_def: A sudden impact or loud noise.
definition.example: The door slammed shut with a loud wham.
